title: Migros Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Buffet, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A popular Swiss buffet-style restaurant where price is based on weight; also has a-la-carte items. Vegan choices include a fresh and diverse salad bar, fresh juices, cooked veggie bar and meals. Good for groups. Free Wi-Fi. Modern design ambiance.
